text: Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Amuddir, Imezgi. Ur Ipnuddum, ur Iggan. IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Anwa akka ara icufaan $uoeS, siwa ma s tsrie iS? Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ur eemuen kra, si tmusni S, siwa ayen i S ihwan. Lewsaa usgeld iS, d tamurt akked igenwan. Ur T issaatab ueareb fellasen. Neppa, d Aalayan, d Ameqwoaean
